title: Wella CEO on Pandemic's Impact on Women
itunes:title: Wella CEO on Pandemic's Impact on Women
description:
Wella Company CEO Annie Young-Scrivner discusses how the pandemic has impacted the female workforce.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
